org.joo.steak.framework.loader

Interface StateEngineLoader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractStateEngineLoader, DefaultStateEngineLoader, LazyStateEngineLoader, PrototypeStateEngineLoader

    public interface StateEngineLoader
    This class can be used to load the actual state and transition from a configuration.
    Author:
    griever

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      State loadState(java.lang.Object stateConfig)
      Load a state from configuration
      StateTransition loadTransition(java.lang.Object transitionConfig)
      Load a transition from configuration
